description:
Did you know prAna was born right near the ocean in Southern California? True story. And you can consider the prAna Tides Long Sleeve Tee for men a nod to our birth place.

This graphic tee was engineered using responsible materials and practices designed to tread lightly on our planet while treating its people right. What's more, it feels great to wear, thanks to soft organic cotton that sits gently on your skin.
name: Prana prAna Tides LS Tee - Standard - Mens
